Key Match Events: Trail Blazers led wire to wire in a 119-100 victory over the Pelicans
Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans played without Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram due to injuries
Post-Match Reflections: Trail Blazers have shown signs of improvement with recent wins, while Pelicans struggled in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Blazers set a season high for a first-half score of 75 points
Herb Jones left the game with a shoulder injury
